Description: All locations within a box defined by the lower left (SW) and upper right (NE) points.
Parameters: south-west latitude, south-west longitude, north-east latitude, north-east longitude

Description: All locations within a box defined by a centre point and a radius in km.
All locations within a circle defined by a centre point and a radius in km.
All locations within a latitude range given by a latitude and a radius in km.
All locations north of a given latitude (inclusive).
All locations south of a given latitude (inclusive).
